00023 int pl_make_packet(struct pl_data *data, char* packet, unsigned int len)
00024 {
00025         int i = 0;
00026 
00027         if ((data == NULL) || (packet == NULL)) 
00028         {
00029                 printf("Error creating packet!\n");
00030                 return -E_PL_NULLPTR;
00031         }
00032         if (len < PL_PACKETSIZE) return -E_PL_INSUFFICIENTBUFFER;
00033 
00034         *(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_TYPE]) = htonl(data->type);
00035         *(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_MODE]) = htonl(data->mode);
00036         *(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_FID]) = htonl(data->function_id);
00037         for (i = 0; i<PL_OPERAND_COUNT; i++) *(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_OP(i)]) = htonl(data->data[i]);
00038 
00039         return E_PL_NOERROR;
00040 }

00050 int pl_extr_packet(char* packet, struct pl_data *data, unsigned int len)
00051 {
00052         int i = 0;
00053 
00054         if ((data == NULL) || (packet == NULL)) 
00055         {
00056                 printf("Error extracting packet!\n");
00057                 return -E_PL_NULLPTR;
00058         }
00059         if (len < PL_PACKETSIZE) return -E_PL_INSUFFICIENTBUFFER;
00060 
00061         data->type = ntohl(*(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_TYPE]));
00062         data->mode = ntohl(*(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_MODE]));
00063         data->function_id = ntohl(*(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_FID]));
00064         for (i = 0; i<PL_OPERAND_COUNT; i++) data->data[i] = ntohl(*(int*)(&packet[PL_PIDX_OP(i)]));
00065         
00066         return E_PL_NOERROR;
00067 }

00078 int pl_create_response(struct pl_data *data)
00079 {
00080         if (data == NULL) return -E_PL_NULLPTR;
00081         
00082         data->type = PL_PTYPE_RSP;
00083         data->mode = PL_MODE_SRV;
00084 
00085         return E_PL_NOERROR;
00086 }

00097 int pl_create_request(struct pl_data *data)
00098 {
00099         if (data == NULL) return -E_PL_NULLPTR;
00100         
00101         data->type = PL_PTYPE_REQ;
00102         data->mode = PL_MODE_CLN;
00103 
00104         return E_PL_NOERROR;

00116 int pl_create_error(struct pl_data *data, int errorcode)
00117 {
00118         if (data == NULL) return -E_PL_NULLPTR;
00119         
00120         data->type = PL_PTYPE_ERR;
00121         data->mode = PL_MODE_SRV;
00122         data->data[0] = errorcode;
00123 
00124         return E_PL_NOERROR;
00125 }
